General.Name: Dongguan Souyute Fashion Co Ltd
General.Description: Souyute Group Co.,Ltd. engages in the research, design, development, and marketing of apparel products. The company provides men's and women's T-shirts, shirts, sweaters, casual wear, down jackets, cotton coats, knitted jackets, washed trousers, jeans, skirts, and others. It also offers medical supplies, supply chain management, brand management, business factoring and investments, etc. Souyute Group Co.,Ltd was founded in 2005 and is based in Dongguan, China.

1.Name: Mr. Gangyan  Liao
1.Title: Deputy GM, Sec. of the Board & Non-Independent Director

3.Name: Ms. Xiaoyan  Huang
3.Title: Mang. of Human Resource Department & Shareholder Supervisor
